definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)

sentences.english: Symmetrically on both sides of the layout, built auxiliary building.
sentences.chinese: 兩側呈對稱佈局，建有匡助修建。

sentences.english: Furthermore, some methods to restrain or decrease the two-side direction burr in grinding-hardening machining are developed.
sentences.chinese: 同時，給出了若干抑制或減少兩側方向毛刺的方法。

sentences.english: On the two sides of the Heaven Palace are Bell Tower and Runner Tibet.
sentences.chinese: 天王殿兩側分別是鐘樓和轉輪藏。

sentences.english: Start by lying on the floor, with your hands by your sides.
sentences.chinese: 仰臥於地板上，把雙手放在身體兩側。

sentences.english: Longevity here both sides of this gate.
sentences.chinese: 在說這大門兩側的福星和壽星。

sentences.english: Black vines crept in and out of windows, through doors and over archways, up the sides of high stone walls.
sentences.chinese: 黑疼爬滿了窗戶，門和拱門，爬上石牆的兩側。

sentences.english: When digging a hole for planting, one should put topsoil and subsoil in two different sides of the hole.
sentences.chinese: 挖栽植坑時，應將表土和底土分別放在坑的兩側。

sentences.english: The coat has two pockets on each side.
sentences.chinese: 這件外衣的兩側各有一個小兜兜。

sentences.english: The shrimp hepatopancreas consists of a lot of epithelial tubules which are symmetrical.
sentences.chinese: 肝胰腺由兩側對稱的分枝上皮小管組成。

sentences.english: With metastasis of both sides, the catheter was inserted into the main trunk of pulmonary artery.
sentences.chinese: 兩側轉移竈者，導管頭端埋於肺總動脈處。

sentences.english: In both sides of the bonded interface, the interdiffusion of components was evident.
sentences.chinese: 結合界面兩側元素相互擴散的趨勢明顯。

sentences.english: This machine is the specialized equipment for spreading hot butyl sealant uniformly onto the two sides of the aluminum spacing frame.
sentences.chinese: 該機是在鋁間隔框兩側均勻塗丁基熱熔膠的專用設備。

sentences.english: Temple sitting West headed east, on both sides of the gate-two stone lions and two Shek Kwu.
sentences.chinese: 寺坐西朝東，山門兩側各放兩隻石獅子和兩隻石鼓。

sentences.english: It plans to develop the handicraft industry in the area alongside Guoji Road.
sentences.chinese: 在國基路兩側地區，擬大力發展工藝品製作業。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
